Ucha

Ucha is a nature freak, he has been hiking around different places in whole Georgia and many places abroad. He holds a master degree in tourism management and several years experience of working in tourism field. Currently being a freelance trainer specializing in Outdoor Adventure Education, Ucha has experience in taking big groups up in the mountains, training them in soft & hard skill development, group performance, personal growth, etc. while also being a logistic manager. Ucha is an amateur photographer, loves taking analog photos in the nature
